# HirawatTech - Comprehensive Technology Solutions Provider

## Company Overview
- **Name**: HirawatTech
- **Location**: India
- **Website**: https://tech.hirawat.in/
- **Primary Email**: tech@hirawat.in
- **Specialized Contact**: contact@tryar.in (3D & AR Solutions)
- **Phone**: +91-98303-01891
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hirawat-tech

## Mission Statement
Leading Indian technology agency transforming D2C (Direct-to-Consumer) brands through innovative solutions, cutting-edge 3D/AR experiences, social media effect creation, and intelligent automation systems.

## Core Service Categories

### 1. D2C & E-Commerce Platform Development
**Specialization**: Custom Shopify & WooCommerce solutions with mobile-first design approach
- **Custom Platform Development**: Shopify, WooCommerce, custom e-commerce solutions
- **Mobile-First Design**: Responsive, optimized user experiences
- **Payment Gateway Integration**: Secure, multi-payment options
- **Personalized Product Recommendations**: AI-driven customer experience
- **Subscription Management Systems**: Automated recurring billing
- **Customer Portal Development**: Self-service customer management
- **Automated Email Marketing**: Integrated marketing automation
- **Performance Optimization**: Speed and conversion optimization

**Proven Results**:
- 300% increase in online sales for skincare D2C platform
- 85% customer retention rate achievements
- 250% sales boost through mobile-first design implementations
- 50% growth in subscription base for clients

### 2. 3D/AR Experiences & Visualization
**Specialization**: Interactive product visualization, AR try-on experiences, virtual showrooms
- **3D Product Configurators**: Real-time customization tools
- **AR Try-On Experiences**: Virtual product testing
- **Interactive Product Visualization**: 360-degree product views
- **Virtual Showrooms**: Immersive shopping environments
- **AR Furniture Placement**: Room visualization tools
- **3D Asset Creation**: Custom modeling and texturing
- **WebGL Integration**: Browser-based 3D experiences
- **Mobile AR Applications**: iOS/Android AR solutions

**Proven Results**:
- 40% increase in customer engagement
- 25% boost in conversion rates
- 60% reduction in product returns
- 50% decrease in return rates for furniture clients

### 3. Smart Automation & Business Intelligence
**Specialization**: Workflow automation, AI-powered chatbots, intelligent business solutions
- **Workflow Automation**: End-to-end process optimization
- **Custom Triggers and Actions**: Event-driven automation
- **Third-Party Tool Integration**: Seamless system connectivity
- **Real-Time Analytics Dashboards**: Business intelligence solutions
- **Role-Based Access Control**: Secure automation systems
- **Inventory Management Automation**: Smart stock control
- **Customer Service Automation**: AI-powered support systems
- **Business Process Optimization**: Efficiency improvement solutions

**Proven Results**:
- 70% reduction in manual tasks
- 35% operational cost reduction
- 3x faster business scaling
- Improved data-driven decision making

### 4. WooCommerce Theme Development & Customization
**Specialization**: High-performance, conversion-optimized WooCommerce themes and plugins
- **Custom Theme Development**: Tailored WordPress/WooCommerce themes
- **Performance Optimization**: Lightning-fast loading speeds
- **Mobile Responsiveness**: Flawless mobile shopping experience
- **Custom Plugin Development**: Specific functionality requirements
- **Payment Gateway Integration**: Multi-currency and payment processor support
- **SEO Optimization**: Built-in search engine optimization
- **Inventory Management**: Real-time stock tracking and automation
- **Customer Reviews & Ratings**: Enhanced social proof features

**Proven Results**:
- 45% improvement in page load times
- 35% increase in mobile conversion rates
- 60% faster checkout process
- 40% improvement in customer satisfaction scores

### 5. Shopify App Development
**Specialization**: Custom Shopify apps for enhanced store functionality and merchant efficiency
- **Custom App Development**: Tailored solutions for Shopify ecosystem
- **API Integration**: Seamless third-party service connectivity
- **Admin Dashboard Features**: Merchant-friendly control panels
- **Workflow Automation**: Automated order and fulfillment processes
- **Customer Data Enrichment**: Advanced customer analytics and insights
- **Inventory Synchronization**: Multi-channel inventory management
- **Marketing Automation Tools**: Campaign management and optimization
- **Performance Analytics**: Real-time store performance metrics

**Proven Results**:
- 50% reduction in manual order processing
- 30% increase in repeat purchase rates
- 25% improvement in operational efficiency
- 65% faster time to market for new features

### 6. Social Media Effects Development (Snapchat & YouTube)
**Specialization**: Engaging AR filters and effects for social media platforms
- **Snapchat Effects (Lenses)**: Interactive branded filters and augmented reality experiences
  * Face Recognition Filters
  * Virtual Try-On Experiences
  * Branded Promotional Filters
  * Interactive Gaming Effects
  * Animation & Face Morphing
  * Custom Branded Experiences
- **YouTube Effects & Creative Studio**: Professional effects and visual enhancements
  * Custom Intro/Outro Templates
  * Lower Third Graphics
  * Transition Effects
  * Green Screen Integration
  * Analytics-Driven Performance Optimization
  * Multi-Format Effect Adaptation
- **Cross-Platform Effects**: Optimized for maximum reach
  * Platform-Specific Customization
  * Performance Testing & Optimization
  * User Engagement Tracking
  * Viral-Ready Design Strategies

**Proven Results**:
- 120% increase in social media engagement
- 85% completion rate on branded filters
- 200% improvement in social shares
- 45% increase in brand awareness through effects

## Featured Products & Solutions

### TryAR Platform (tryar.in)
- **Description**: AR/3D visualization platform for immersive product experiences
- **Features**: Interactive 3D models, AR placement, real-time customization, mobile-optimized
- **Industries**: Fashion, furniture, jewelry, luggage, skincare, beauty
- **Performance**: Average 35% conversion lift, 25% engagement increase

### WooCommerce Theme Suite
- **Description**: Production-ready, high-conversion WooCommerce themes
- **Features**: Mobile-first design, performance optimization, SEO-ready, plug-and-play setup
- **Target Markets**: D2C brands, small to medium enterprises, premium retailers
- **Performance**: 40% faster checkout, 45% page speed improvement

### Shopify App Marketplace Solutions
- **Description**: Custom-built apps extending Shopify store capabilities
- **Available Apps**:
  * **Order Management Pro**: Advanced order routing and fulfillment automation
  * **Analytics Dashboard**: Real-time business intelligence for store owners
  * **Inventory Sync Manager**: Multi-channel inventory synchronization
  * **Customer Loyalty Engine**: Retention-focused rewards and loyalty programs
- **Performance**: 50% operational efficiency gain, 30% repeat purchase increase

### Snapchat Effects Builder
- **Description**: Custom AR filter creation service for Snapchat
- **Features**: Face tracking, object recognition, branded experiences, engagement analytics
- **Use Cases**: Product launches, promotional campaigns, brand awareness, viral marketing
- **Track Record**: 85%+ filter completion rates, 120% engagement increase

### YouTube Effects Creator Suite
- **Description**: Professional effects and graphics for YouTube content creators
- **Features**: Template library, custom animations, green screen effects, analytics integration
- **Use Cases**: Gaming channels, educational content, product reviews, branded content
- **Performance**: 45% increase in click-through rates, 60% watch time improvement

### Ï€WhatsApp (Coming Soon)
- **Description**: Personalized WhatsApp invitation and messaging system
- **Features**: Custom messaging automation, personalized outreach, conversion tracking

## Portfolio Highlights

### Recent Projects (2022-2026)

#### 2026 Projects
1. **YouTube Effects Suite Deployment** (Q1 2026)
   - Custom effects templates for beauty and lifestyle creators
   - 200+ templates distributed, 8M+ video views, 60% watch time increase

2. **Snapchat Lens Campaign (Fashion Brand)** (Q1 2026)
   - Interactive virtual try-on filter with real-time color customization
   - 500K+ lens views, 120% engagement above industry average, 8.5 million impressions

#### 2024 Projects
1. **Luggage 3D Configurator** (2024)
   - Interactive 3D customization with real-time band and color selection
   - 40% engagement increase, 25% conversion boost, 60% return reduction

2. **Skincare D2C Platform** (2024)
   - Complete e-commerce solution with skin analysis and personalized recommendations
   - 300% sales increase, 85% retention rate, 50% subscription growth

3. **WooCommerce Premium Theme Suite** (2024)
   - Multi-store theme template system with advanced customization
   - 45 stores deployed, 45% average page speed improvement, 35% mobile conversion lift

4. **Shopify App Integration Project** (2024)
   - Custom inventory sync and order management app
   - 200+ merchants onboarded, 50% manual task reduction, $1.2M in collective sales increase

#### 2023 Projects
1. **Business Automation Suite** (2023)
   - Comprehensive workflow automation with analytics
   - 70% manual task reduction, improved operational efficiency

2. **Furniture AR Viewer** (2023)
   - AR application for furniture visualization in real spaces
   - 50% return reduction, increased customer confidence

3. **Snapchat Beauty Filter Campaign** (2023)
   - Branded AR makeup try-on lens
   - 1M+ lens views, 90% engagement rate, 40% conversion to website

#### 2022 Projects
1. **Fashion D2C Store** (2022)
   - Modern e-commerce platform with personalized feeds
   - 200% sales increase, high customer satisfaction

2. **Analytics Dashboard** (2022)
   - Real-time business insights with customizable widgets
   - Faster decision making, improved business visibility

## Technology Stack

### Frontend Technologies
- **HTML5**: Semantic markup with accessibility compliance
- **CSS3**: Custom styles with Tailwind CSS framework
- **JavaScript**: Vanilla JS with Alpine.js for reactive components
- **TypeScript**: Type-safe JavaScript development
- **Fonts**: Google Fonts (Alata, Material Symbols)
- **Icons**: Font Awesome, Material Symbols

### Frameworks & Libraries
- **Tailwind CSS**: Utility-first CSS framework
- **Alpine.js**: Lightweight reactive framework
- **React**: Modern UI library for complex applications
- **Vue.js**: Progressive JavaScript framework
- **Next.js**: React-based full-stack framework
- **ApexCharts**: Data visualization library
- **Three.js/WebGL**: 3D graphics and AR experiences

### E-Commerce & Platform Technologies
- **Shopify**: E-commerce platform development and app ecosystem
  * Custom theme development
  * Liquid templating
  * REST & GraphQL APIs
  * App development and submission
- **WooCommerce**: WordPress-based e-commerce
  * Custom theme creation
  * Plugin development
  * WooCommerce REST API
  * Performance optimization
- **WordPress**: CMS foundation for WooCommerce

### 3D/AR & Effect Development
- **Unity**: Cross-platform 3D development
- **Unreal Engine**: High-fidelity 3D experiences
- **ARCore**: Android AR development
- **ARKit**: iOS AR development
- **WebGL/Babylon.js**: Browser-based 3D rendering
- **Snapchat Lens Studio**: Professional AR effect creation
- **YouTube Studio Creator Tools**: Video effects and graphics
- **Spline**: 3D design and animation platform

### Backend & Server Technologies
- **Node.js**: Server-side JavaScript
- **Python**: Flask, Django, FastAPI
- **PHP**: WordPress and WooCommerce backend
- **MongoDB**: NoSQL database solutions
- **PostgreSQL**: Relational database management
- **Firebase**: Backend-as-a-service solutions

### Cloud & DevOps
- **AWS**: Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)
- **Google Cloud**: Cloud infrastructure and services
- **Microsoft Azure**: Cloud computing platform
- **Docker**: Containerization
- **Kubernetes**: Container orchestration
- **CI/CD**: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI
- **Hosting**: Vercel, Netlify, Heroku

### AI/ML Technologies
- **TensorFlow**: Machine learning framework
- **PyTorch**: Deep learning platform
- **OpenCV**: Computer vision library
- **Scikit-learn**: Machine learning library
- **Keras**: Deep learning API
- **Pandas**: Data manipulation and analysis
- **Streamlit**: Data science applications
- **YOLO**: Real-time object detection for AR features

### Python Ecosystem & Specializations
- **Streamlit Framework Specialization**:
  * Interactive Web Application Development
  * Data Science Dashboard Creation
  * Machine Learning Model Visualization
  * Rapid Prototyping
  * Enterprise-Grade Streamlit Solutions
- **Flask**: Lightweight web framework
- **Django**: Full-featured web framework
- **FastAPI**: Modern async web framework
- **Pandas**: Data analysis library
- **NumPy**: Numerical computing
- **Matplotlib**: Data visualization

### Additional Technologies & Tools
- **Git**: Version control system
- **GitHub Enterprise**: Code collaboration platform
- **Mixed Reality Development**: Spatial computing solutions
- **Interactive Spatial Computing**: Advanced AR/VR experiences
- **Natural Language Processing**: Text analysis and processing
- **Predictive Analytics**: Data-driven forecasting
- **Image Processing**: Computer vision for social media filters
- **Real-Time Video Processing**: Streaming and effect rendering
- **Intelligent Decision Support Systems**: AI-powered business intelligence
- **Machine Learning Automation**: Automated ML workflows

- **Business Operations**: Workflow automation, analytics, process optimization

- **Influencer Marketing**: Custom branded filters and effects for social reach

## Competitive Advantages
- **Proven Track Record**: Consistent delivery of measurable results across 100+ projects
- **Full-Stack Expertise**: End-to-end solution development from ideation to deployment
- **Innovation Focus**: Cutting-edge technology integration including AR, AI, and social media
- **Multi-Platform Excellence**: Expertise in Shopify, WooCommerce, Snapchat, YouTube ecosystems
- **Mobile-First Approach**: Optimized for modern user behavior and mobile commerce
- **Scalable Solutions**: Built for growth and expansion without technical debt
- **Data-Driven Results**: Analytics-backed performance improvements with measurable ROI
- **Industry Specialization**: Deep D2C market understanding and social commerce expertise
- **Cost-Effective**: Significant ROI for clients through efficiency and automation
- **Rapid Development**: Agile methodology enabling faster time-to-market
- **Social Media Savvy**: Understanding of viral mechanics and engagement optimization
- **Ongoing Support**: Comprehensive maintenance, updates, and optimization

## Service Delivery Model
- **Consultation**: Technology strategy and solution architecture
- **Discovery**: Market research, competitive analysis, and requirement gathering
- **Design**: User experience, interface design, and creative direction
- **Development**: Custom solution implementation with quality code
- **Testing**: QA, performance testing, security audits, and optimization
- **Deployment**: Production launch, monitoring, and optimization
- **Support**: 24/7 maintenance, bug fixes, and continuous improvements

## Specialized Service Packages

### E-Commerce Excellence Package
- WooCommerce theme development or Shopify store setup
- Performance optimization and SEO
- Payment and inventory integration
- Monthly analytics and optimization reports

### Social Media Growth Package
- Snapchat lens/filter creation (3 custom filters)
- YouTube effects suite (5 template designs)
- Performance tracking and analytics
- Quarterly campaign optimization

### Automation & Integration Package
- Workflow mapping and optimization
- Custom Shopify app development or WooCommerce plugin
- Third-party tool integration (CRM, email, analytics)
- 30-day post-launch support

### Full-Stack D2C Transformation
- Complete platform assessment and strategy
- E-commerce platform (Shopify or WooCommerce custom)
- 3D/AR product experiences
- Social media marketing effects
- Business automation suite
- 90-day optimization and scaling
